name: getPeriodicReportPdf successfully returns PDF report in base64
testSteps:
Initialize a JavaScript environment with the following properties: 
- SDK imported
- User authenticated
- User has periodic reports
Fetch a periodic report through the `getPeriodicReportPdf`
expectedResult: The method returns a PDF report in `base64` encoding
parentNames: Method getPeriodicReportPdf returns the PDF content of a specific periodic report
